name: Mil Mikkir
content: Mil Mikkir was a male Chagrian manager of of an Outer Rim construction company owned by his father during Galactic Civil War. He spent some of his youth roaming Port Town where he briefly dabbled with a mild form of spice. He later attended an auction on Cloud City with the intent of acquiring the Jewel of Yavin to prevent his ex-lover, Shreya Ordassa from obtaining it.
